title: SWE - Cellular Performance Engineer, Wireless Technologies
summary: Join the Wireless Technologies and Ecosystems organization and drive innovation that matters! As part of the Wireless team you will be working on building solutions for Wireless technologies. We are looking for a highly motivated individual who can excel in a high-paced environment. Be ready to make something extraordinary. Dynamic, inspiring people and innovative, industry-defining technologies are the norm at Apple. The people who work here have reinvented and defined entire industries with our products and services. The same real passion for innovation also applies to our business practices - strengthening our dedication to leave the world better than we found it. You should join the Apple Wireless Performance Team if you want to help deliver the next amazing Apple product.
description:
You will engage with lab characterization as well as field log analysis. Phenomenal opportunity to interact with multiple engineering-groups, vendors and suppliers. Develop expertise in wireless communication system/software/hardware/RF requirements and define the power/performance KPI for the product. Also, will act as a liaison between technology and product engineering teams as a gatekeeper of end user facing quality. Opportunity to bring in fresh ideas to evangelize the 4G/5G technology across Apple's new product introductions, services and ecosystem initiatives, and work towards design wins in a data driven way from prototyping to commercialization.

key_qualifications:
Extensive hands on experience in system engineering/System Performance analysis role
Validated experience in wireless communication protocols and systems. Deep understanding of wireless standards: (including but not limited to 3GPP 5G-NR/5GC, LTE, IEEE 802.11ax, 802.11ad, IP, TCP/UDP) and their application to end to end product performance
Shown experience with 4G/5G network emulators and major infra vendor equipment
Experienced with scripting and developing performance automation tools and software is a plus
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Ability to work in a highly multi-functional setting across SW, HW, RF, Carrier/Partner engineering and Product Design teams
Ability to quickly adapt to new technologies and out-of-the box thinking and to propose technology and product improvements in a data driven way
Demonstrable and proven wireless system performance, design or architecture experience
education_experience: Master/PhD degree in Electrical Engineering, Wireless Communications or equivalent majors.
